title: Champion Idea "Alex - The Mechanised"
body:
So I had this idea for a Mobile, CC heavy yet item reliant Bruiser focused around shutting down targets, forcing fights. 

Plan for numbers is low base numbers but good scaling from AD/AP. 

                 ----------------------------------

Passive - Life Force Detection Goggles

Every 15 seconds, Alex's goggles detect weakspots in all nearby (900 range) enemy's armor. Increasing her next instance of damage by 15%.

Additionally nearby enemies (750 range) are revealed by a small green light over their location 1.5 seconds beforehand.

Q - Seismic Crush (Frontal Cone AoE). Deals Physical damage in a cone (similar range to Cho'Gath's Feral Scream). Enemies in the cone are knocked up for 1 second. 

W - Nitro Boots (Passive Buff & Targeted Active) - Passive - grants 1/2/3/4/5% increased movement speed and can move through units. 

Active - Dashes to a target. Slowing their movement by 40%. If a unit intercepts the pathing between Alex and her target, she will stop at that target instead. Can target allied or enemy units as well as wards. Cannot move through terrain.

E - Force Gauntlet - (Narrow Linear Skillshot) - Alex punches the air dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line, stunning them briefly (0.25 seconds) and pushing them backwards 100 range). 

R - Force Gauntlet Rocket Formation Zero (Auto Attack Bonus) - Alex next auto attack will launch her to her target. Once she arrives to her target she begins a barrage of strikes. The target is suppressed for 4 seconds. Each second she strikes the target dealing attack damage plus on hit effects. As she lands each attack she disappears and reappears clockwise around the target (her beginning points is say 12 she then moves to 3 > 6 > 9 back to 12). While she has disappeared she is invulnerable for approx 0.2 seconds. Each attack she will complete the attack animation. Can be cc'd/targeted once she reappears. Can dash over terrain.

Pros:

Good CC
Good Mobility around enemies.
Provides quality information with Passive
Semi Targeted CC on ult can be used to shut down key targets in Team Fights. 
Has CC on Q, E and R. 

Cons:

Low survivability
Low mobility outside of combat
Predictable movement within ult, can lead to her being targeted down.
No reliable poke
Relies on items to increase damage/survival. 


---

Feedback/suggestion/number suggestions appreciated.

I really like the idea of the champion and I think they would be an enjoyable champion to play.
However, there are a few things I think that you could just polish off to make them even better.
Firstly, the 4 second suppress on the ultimate is simply too high. Having such a long cc duration on a 'targeted' ability makes it way too easy to get a pick or setup a kill for your team.
Also, the W ability feels a bit lackluster. The movement speed is not too much to behold and it is essentially just a dash. Maybe giving it a little more movement speed (2/4/6/8/10% maybe) and also giving the active an enhanced auto attack on top of the dash? Maybe it could proc the 15% bonus damage from your passive?
Lastly, I love the idea of the passive. I think it is very helpful to not only you but also your team and can change how a game is played. 10/10 passive.
Overall, I thought you've made a very good champion and I would love to play it if it is made.

Thanks for the feedback! Much appreciated!

I was thinking a 4 second supress would be a bit too long. How I want it to work essentially is she can be interrupted during the dash to the target stopping it, as well as she can be CC'd during the animation of the attacks - maybe a 1.5 second supress however each attack lands over the 4 second duration. That way she can at least get one hit in with the ult - and gives people a chance to counter the remainder of the ult with defensive a etc (eg flash into your team to have someone in range when she reappears for the next attack.

Agreed I think W is a bit lacking - the enhanced Auto Attack is an idea, I didn't want her to be a Vi replica haha - I think that giving her something even like a second cast where it enhances the auto right after it's been cast (like an AA reset). 

Maybe even like W - increases movement speed by 1.5/3/4.5/6/7.5% and the active - dash remains the same but can be cast again to reset the cool down on the passive. 

Glad you like the passive I wanted it to give some utility with a team rather than just being a cc bot - I did the next instance of damage so you actually have to think about it being up and not blowing it on AAs but also because I'd want her to have low base damage to make up for her CC heavy kit. The damage boost allows her to possibly trade in lane etc.
